description.description: A one-line description of the plugin

vcsLink.description: A URL pointing to the plugin repository

license.description: A reference to software license used by the plugin

category.description: Logical grouping for the plugin where it will be configured

prerequisites.description: Plugin IDs that are also required along with this

installation.description: Mapping of installation snippets to be included in the generated project

in_routing.description: In a file, separate from Application.kt

test_function.description: In ApplicationTest.kt as a separate function

client.description: In the installation of the HttpClient, in the client module

web.description: In the main function of the web module, executed in the browser

outside_web.description: Outside the main function of the web module

sources.description: List of custom source file paths, with keywords in parentheses

resources.description: List of custom source file paths, with keywords in parentheses

documentation.description: Markdown string or file reference to populate the plugin details. Must include a 'Usage' header.

gradle.description: Define custom gradle script injections required for your plugin.

disabled.description: Indicates this plugin cannot be used with Gradle

repositories.description: A list of repositories that will be included in the generated build script.

plugins.description: A list of gradle plugins that will be included in the generated build script.

disabled.description: Indicates this plugin cannot be used with Amper

maven.description: Define custom maven script injections required for your plugin.

disabled.description: Indicates this plugin cannot be used with Maven

repositories.description: A list of repositories that will be included in the generated build script.

plugins.description: A list of gradle plugins that will be included in the generated build script.
